metadata.title: CVE-2024-33599 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: nscd: Stack-based buffer overflow in netgroup cache If the Name ServiceCache Daemon's (nscd) fixed size cache is exhausted by client requests thena subsequent client request for netgroup data may result in a stack-basedbuffer overflow. This flaw was introduced in glibc 2.15 when the cache wasadded to nscd. This vulnerability is only present in the nscd binary.

criterions.comment: glibc package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
